item.description:
G for Gratitude
A for Appreciation
Which is better – Attitude of Gratitude or Attitude of Appreciation?
Which will bring you more aligned to your Higher Self, to being a powerful attractor?

We’ll listen & watch (via audio/video) what master teachers/coaches have to share to
-    ‘experience’ the difference
-    get more tune in, tap in and turn on to the essence of G & A
-    and more….

Also, a special Thanksgiving treat from Suzy Spivey, Boston LoA member & charismatic Dream & Life Purpose Coach and Journey Dance Instructor:

-->Be ready to tune in, tap in to your heart chakra with ease, joy & flow, and turn on a daily "being" of Gratitude & Appreciation.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group
